jobList.Title: Accelerated Command
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Accelerated command is an opportunity for motivated Captains to fly a modern wide body aircraft worldwide.

 

Qualifications & Experience

To join our Accelerated Command program, you will need the following experience:

 

  • Minimum of 5000 hours total flying time (excluding P3, rotary and single/multi-engine piston aircraft) 
  • Minimum of 2000 hours command time on fixed wing, multi-crew commercial jet aircraft with MTOW > 50 tonnes
  • For Airbus you must currently be flying as an Airbus FBW captain and have a minimum of 1000 hours PIC on Airbus FBW*
  • For Boeing you must currently be flying as a Boeing captain and have a minimum of 1000 hours PIC on Boeing
  • Minimum 150 hours in past 12 months on type
  • Valid ICAO ATPL with matching Authority Class 1 Medical
  • ICAO English Level 5 or above 

 

**Airbus FBW (A320/A330/A340/A350/A380)**

 

Please make sure you attach these documents to your online application:

 

1. CV

2. Passport

3. ATPL with the type-rating for the aircraft you currently fly

4. Class 1 medical certificate with no limitations (except visual corrections)

Salary & Benefits
Join our growing team and enjoy a competitive remuneration package, discounts on flights and hotel stays. Find out more about working with us in our website www.emirates.com/careers"

jobList.Title: Airbus Direct Entry Captain
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

 Are you a technically proficient commander with experience on a modern wide body aircraft who aims to deliver excellence?

 

We offer a competitive total remuneration package, paid tax free in Dubai. You can find out more about our airline, our employee benefits and living in Dubai on our careers website.
Qualifications & Experience

To become one of our Airbus Captains, you will need:

  • Minimum 7000hrs total flying time (excluding P3, rotary and single/multi-engine piston aircraft)    
  • For A380, you must currently be flying as an Airbus FBW Wide Body Captain and have a minimum of 3000 hours PIC on Airbus FBW Wide Body
  • For A350, you must have a minimum of 3000 hours command time on a multi-crew, multi-engine commercial jet aircraft with MTOW of >50T. Minimum 1500 hours must be as a Captain on an Airbus FBW Wide Body aircraft.
  •       Minimum 150hrs in past 12 months on type
  •       A valid ICAO ATPL with a matching Authority Class 1 Medical
  •      ICAO English level 5 or above

 

Please make sure you attach these documents to your online application:

 

1. CV

2. Passport

3. ATPL with the type-rating for the aircraft you currently fly

4. Class 1 medical certificate with no limitations (except visual corrections)

 

 

Salary & Benefits
Join our growing team and enjoy a competitive remuneration package, discounts on flights and hotel stays. Find out more about working with us in our website www.emirates.com/careers"

jobList.Title: First Officer Opportunities - A380 & B777
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose
Are you a motivated and technically proficient pilot who delivers excellence?
 
We offer a competitive total remuneration package, paid tax free in Dubai. You can find out more about our airline, employee benefits and living in Dubai on our careers website.
Qualifications & Experience

To become a first officer, you will need a minimum of 2,000 hours total flying time. More experienced first officers, with 4,000+ hours, can expect an enhanced salary package.

 B777

  • Minimum of 2000 hours total flying time ≥ 20T Jet (excluding P3, rotary and single/multi-engine piston aircraft)
  • Minimum of 1000hrs on Boeing Type
  • Currently flying Boeing Type
  • Minimum 150 hours within the past 12 months on type
  • A valid ICAO ATPL & matching Authority Class 1 Medical certificate*
  • ICAO English Level 4 or above 

 A380

  • Minimum of 2000 hours total flying time on ≥ 50T Jet (excluding P3, rotary and single/multi-engine piston aircraft)
  • Minimum of 1000hrs on Airbus FBW*
  • Currently flying Airbus FBW*
  • Minimum 150 hours within the past 12 months on type
  • A valid ICAO ATPL & matching Authority Class 1 Medical certificate*
  • ICAO English Level 4 or above 

**Airbus FBW (A320/A330/A340/A350/A380)**

Enhanced Package criteria: 

  • 4,000 hours total flying time of 20T Jet or more (excluding P3 & rotary)
  • Minimum of 2000 hours total flying time on ≥ 50T Jet
  • ICAO English Level 5 or above 

Pilots with Frozen ATPL (CPL + ATPL Theory exams completed) can be invited for assessment on the provision that they agree to our FATPL terms and conditions.

  

Please make sure you attach these documents to your online application:

 

1. CV

2. Passport

3. ATPL with the type-rating for the aircraft you currently fly

           (If holding a Frozen ATPL you are required to upload:

            a. CPL  and

            b. the ATPL Theory Exams successfully completed)

4. Class 1 medical certificate with no limitations (except visual corrections)

 

 

Salary & Benefits
Join our growing team and enjoy a competitive remuneration package, discounts on flights and hotel stays. Find out more about working with us in our website www.emirates.com/careers"

jobList.Title: Contact Centre Agent - Czech Speaking based in Manchester
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Are you looking for a job where you can grow professionally and build your career in a multinational airline? If you love traveling, interacting with customers and colleagues from across the Emirates network, there are opportunities for you.

Emirates is the world’s largest international airline, with a network that spans over 130 destinations in 85 countries. We are currently looking for Customer Sales and Service Professionals to join our multicultural team in Manchester UK.

Job Outline:

  • Be the voice of Emirates and ensure the highest standard of customer service is delivered to Emirates customers by providing information about our products and services.
  • Identify customer needs through rapport building, actively seeking out sales opportunities and promoting all Emirates related products.
  • Issue Emirates tickets to customers ensuring their request is met and offer them tailor made travel solutions.
  • Actively enhance Emirates revenue earnings by promoting additional services offered by the company and its partners.

Requirements & Skills:

  • Fluency in both English and Czech is a must.
  • Customer and sales orientation to provide excellent service and close any sales opportunities.
  • Good listening and communication skills.
  • PC based skills to operate Windows package (Microsoft Word/Excel/E-mail).
  • Ability to work in a multiple shift environment.

Experience required:

  • Experience in Contact Centre/Hospitality/Travel industry advantageous.

The annual salary for the role starts at approximately GBP28,000 plus

  • Eligibility to participate in the monthly focus bonus scheme after 6 months which equates to a payment of 1.5%, 3.5% or 7.5% of salary to meeting/exceeding/significantly exceeding performance targets.
Qualifications & Experience
  • Applicants must have the legal right to live and work in the United Kingdom
  • Previous Customer Service or Contact Centre experience
  • Fluent in English and Czech (written and spoken skills)
  • Ability to work in a busy call handling / sales team environment
  • Excellent interpersonal, telephone and customer service skills
  • 10 Years schooling or equivalent
  • PC based skills to operate Windows packages including Microsoft Word/Excel/E-mail

 

Salary & Benefits
Join our growing team and enjoy a competitive remuneration package, discounts on flights and hotel stays. Find out more about working with us in our website www.emirates.com/careers"

jobList.Title: National Graduate Training Programme (UAE Nationals Only) - Internal Audit
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Do you want to be part of one of the leading and fastest growing global brands based in one of the world’s most exciting and vibrant cities? A world where ambitions fly high and our people are at the centre of what we do

We have an exciting opportunity for talented UAE national graduates to join us in Dubai, United Arab Emirates as part of a three phased Internal Audit Graduate Programme. 


The objective of this programme is to develop the skills of talented UAE national graduates and provide them with a strong foundation to pursue a career in Internal Audit, one of the key functions within an organisation. Once you graduate from this programme, you will be a qualified internal audit professional, gaining both technical and soft skills, to allow you to grow within the profession or move into a leadership role within the business.


What will I do

 

You will become an integral part of the Emirates Group Internal Audit team supporting one of the world’s most dynamic and diverse aviation groups. You will deliver assurance and advisory projects across the Group (both in Dubai and overseas) using specialist technical audit skills to provide management with an independent appraisal of risk management and governance across the Emirates Group. You will work closely with Internal Audit Managers to scope, plan and execute audits, and discuss and communicate audit results to the appropriate level of management in the business.

Qualifications & Experience

What do I need?

 

Below are some of the skills & experience we are looking for:

 

  • Degree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent) in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration with a CGPA of 3.5 and above
  • Excellent conceptual, numerical and analytical skills
  • Strong English communication and presentation skills (written and verbal)
  • Aptitude for continuous learning and independent work
  • Passion to travel and interact with people from different cultures
  • Candidates should hold a valid UAE passport and Khulasat Al Qaid
  • Military services clearance status

Since this is a graduate trainee programme, whilst some Finance/Audit experience is beneficial no formal work experience will be required since experience will be gained through a 3 phased programme along with an accounting/ finance professional qualification (e.g. CIA, ACCA, etc.) 

The duration of the programme is three years and is divided into three main phases:


Phase 1: 12 months 


This phase will involve an orientation and introduction to the Emirates Group and Group Internal Audit. You’ll develop an understanding of audit methodology and the lifecycle of an audit. Once you’re familiar with the department, you’ll join one of the Big4 accounting firms (e.g. PricewaterhouseCoopers) and work in their assurance departments (external audit, internal audit, and risk). You’ll be expected to study for part 1 of the Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) qualification or other accounting/ finance qualification over the duration of the secondment.

 

Phase 2 – 12 months 


During this phase, you will be rostered on audits within the Emirates Group which would include exposure to UAE and international businesses. These audits will enable you to strengthen the financial knowledge you gained from the secondment and be able to apply your skills and review key financial processes under the guidance of team leaders on the job. You will be expected to study for part 2 of the Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) qualification or other accounting/ finance qualification over the duration of this phase to pass the exam successfully.


Phase 3 – 12 months 


During this phase, you will be assigned to audits across the different portfolios within the Group. You will be expected to work independently and deliver a process audit end-to-end. You will be expected to study for part 3 of the Certified Internal Auditor (CIA) qualification or other accounting/ finance qualification over the duration of this phase to pass the exam successfully.

Excited by the opportunity to be part of a dynamic, successful company like Emirates Group?
Give us your talent, commitment and hard work and we’ll give you an exciting world of opportunity. Let’s explore the future together. 

On top of our generous travel benefits, including discounted flights and hotel stays, dining and entertainment around the world, this role also has excellent leave and healthcare, life insurance and more. 

Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."

jobList.Title: CABIN SERVICES ASSISTANT
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

To organise, hygienically clean and personalise the A380 Shower Spas with the objective of ensuring each First Class customer who uses this unique onboard feature is delighted by the experience.

The primary area of responsibility is Shower Spa cleanliness and personalisation, however, maintenance of First, Business and Economy Class lavatories, First and Business Class Lounges and general cabin areas is also a responsibility of this role, all to project a positive company image to our customers.

The role is to clean designated aircraft areas and does not overlap with or replace normal Cabin Crew service duties. The CSA will report to the Purser, or the Cabin Supervisor, should the Purser be on crew rest or otherwise unavailable. This role requires travelling.

Job Outline:

Performs inventory control function confirming products are loaded in the correct quantities. This to ensure onboard facilities can be correctly serviced, in-flight replenishments can be made and a wide range of products will be available for customers to select from in using the facilities.

  • To check Shower Spa and lavatory cleanliness prior to passenger boarding placing appropriate amenity items to prepare for passenger use.
  • To “Personalise the Shower Spa” for each customer at the allocated time from the Shower Spa Reservations System, with selected products displayed in the appropriate manner to delight customers who are using the facility.

 

Qualifications & Experience

Qualifications: 

  • High School Diploma or equivalent. 
  • Experience: - A minimum of 2 years customer service experience with an international hotel chain/airline/world class service provider. 
  • Experience working in Hospitality Industry within housekeeping department would be an advantage. 
  • Knowledge/skills: - Must be fluent in written and spoken English. 
  • Minimum height of 160 cm and Arm reach of at least 210cm (on tip toes).

 

Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."

jobList.Title: Customer Service Roles
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Customer Service Roles

 

The Emirates Group is a highly profitable business comprising of Emirates Airline, the largest international airline in the world and dnata, one of the world's biggest air services providers. With our headquarters located in the cosmopolitan emirate of Dubai, working with us puts you at the forefront of technological advances in the aviation industry while offering you a dynamic lifestyle.

 

If you're seeking a position that will allow you to thrive professionally and develop your career in aviation industry, look no further. There are openings for individuals who are passionate about traveling and enjoy collaborating with customers and colleagues across the world.

 

We are looking for exceptional individuals who can be a part of our Customer Service team. If successful, you will join an extensive training program which include systems training and customer service skills and then be allocated to an area across the group: Emirates Airport Services, dnata, marhaba services and Contact Centre.

 

Experience the excitement of being on the front-line customer-facing roles with dnata, marhaba and Emirates Airport Services Agents, or work behind the scenes as a Contact Centre Service Agent. You'll have the chance to work with a diverse team of professionals, interact with people from all over the world, and make a positive impact on the lives of travellers every day. Both full-time and part-time opportunities are available, providing flexibility to fit your lifestyle and career goals.

 

Whether it be Emirates Airline or dnata, our goal is to ensure that our customers experience service is consistent with the Emirates Group high standards.

 

During the hiring process, you can expect:
• Step 1 – Apply
Submit your application and we’ll then send you an email to confirm that we’ve received your application.
• Step 2 – Review
Our Recruitment Team will review your application.
• Step 3 – Video Interview and Assessment
If you’re shortlisted for the role, we’ll send you a link to our on-demand, interactive and gamified video interview assessment via HireVue. This is most critical part of the process and required if you want to progress to the next stage.
• Step 4 – Offer


If successful, we’ll notify you an offer of employment which will include the benefits package for your role.


 

Qualifications & Experience

To be considered for Customer Service roles, you must meet the following requirements:

• Fluency in both spoken and written English
• Fluency in any other language is a plus
• A levels/High School certificate
• Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills
• Willing to work in a shift environment
• PC based skills to operate Windows package (Microsoft Word/Excel/E-mail)
• Willing to wear uniform (Front-line customer facing roles)

 

We have outlined below the specific job details for each of our roles:


I. Customer-facing Roles:

 

Airport Services Agent (EK/dnata) & marhaba Services Agent

 

As an Airport Service Agent, you will be responsible for delivering top-notch customer service to our valued passengers during check-in, boarding, and baggage handling. Your dedication to provide a high-quality service experience will be integral to ensuring our customers have a seamless and enjoyable journey from start to finish.

Our marhaba Services Agents go above and beyond to provide exceptional travel assistance services to our valued clients. Whether you are a VIP, marhaba client, an unaccompanied minor, or a passenger with special needs, we are dedicated to ensuring that you receive the highest level of care and attention throughout your journey.


II. Back-office Role:

 

Contact Centre Services Agent
As a Contact Centre Service Agent, you will have the important role of being the voice of Emirates, providing our valued customers with accurate and up-to-date information about our products and services. We are seeking a skilled professional to provide exceptional customer service by promptly and accurately responding to inquiries either through various digital communication channels, such as chat and social media platforms or through voice support. Your role will be crucial in ensuring that our customers feel valued and supported throughout their journey.

 

Job specific requirements for back-office roles :
• Proficiency in English and at least one of the following languages is a must-have requirement for this position: Arabic, Czech, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, Korean.
• Customer and sales focus to provide excellent service and close any sales opportunity.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • The ability to type accurately and quickly while maintaining excellent written communication is an essential requirement for the messaging-based role.     

 

Salary & Benefits
We offer an attractive tax-free salary, paid in Dirhams, the local currency of the UAE. The Dirham is linked to the Special Drawing Right of the International Monetary Fund. It has been held constant against the US dollar since the end of 1980 at a mid-rate of approximately US$1= Dh3.66. Besides travel benefits normally associated with an airline, more information on employee benefits is available within the 'Working Here' section of this site. By viewing the 'Dubai Lifestyle' section in the site you can also consider the benefits of Dubai as a location to live and work in."

jobList.Title: National Cadet Pilot Programme (U.A.E. Nationals Only)
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

National Cadet Pilot Programme 

Become one of the best trained pilots in the world and fly the flag of the nation to over 140 destinations.

We’re looking for young and ambitious Emiratis with the passion and commitment to join our National Cadet Pilot Programme and train to become world-class pilots at the Emirates Flight Training Academy in Dubai.

What we provide

Our fully sponsored programme covers the cost of your training for at least four years, including training materials, accommodation, uniforms and three daily meals.

Joining our programme will take you from zero flying hours through to ground school and the skies in a multi-engine, multi-crew aircraft. After graduation, you’ll be qualified to take command of one of the newest and most modern fleets in the sky with Emirates, the world’s largest international airline.

Our selection process

Candidates who meet the selection criteria will be invited for assessments.

 

Stage 1

Maths and Physics assessments.

Medical pre-screening at the EK Clinic.

 

Stage 2

Compass test 

Aviation English test

Psychometrics tests. Including Abstract Reasoning and Spatial Reasoning. 

 

Stage 3

Panel interview. 

GCAA Medical examination.


Programme details

The National Cadet Programme is divided into the following phases:

 

Ab-initio Pilot

Phase 1 – Ground School

EMIRATES FLIGHT TRAINING ACADEMY

 

  • You will study using state-of-the-art technology and VR.
  • ATPL theoretical knowledge.
  • Duration: Approximately 12 months.
  • Pay and benefits: Stipend of AED 6,000 per month, concessional staff travel tickets, medical insurance, meals and accommodation.

Phase 2 – Flight Training

EMIRATES FLIGHT TRAINING ACADEMY

  • This phase will provide you with approximately 274 hours of flight and simulator experience on the SR 22 Cirrus single engine aircraft, the Diamond DA42 twin engine aircraft and the Phenom-100 Jet aircraft. At the end of the course you will have a Commercial Pilot Licence (Frozen ATPL) with a Multi-Instrument   Rating (CPL/Multi IR) a Multi Crew Cooperation Course (MCC), and Jet Orientation Course Certificate.
  •  Duration: Approximately 12 months.
  •   Pay and benefits: Stipend of AED 6,000 per month, concessional staff travel tickets, medical insurance, meals and accommodation.

Cadet Pilot

Phase 3

EMIRATES TRAINING COLLEGE

  • Conversion, Type Rating and Line Training on one of the Emirates widebody aircraft. In this phase you will go through a type rating course followed by line training.
  •   Duration: Approximately 3 months.
  •   Pay and benefits: Stipend of AED 17,300 per month, concessional staff travel tickets, medical insurance & meals.

Phase 4

EMIRATES GROUP HEADQUARTERS / DUBAI AIRPORT

  •        In this phase, you’ll complete the course, receive a Type Rating on one of the Emirates wide body aircraft you have been trained on and a Frozen Air Transport Pilot Licence (Frozen ATPL) approved by the UAE General Civil Aviation Authority.
  •       Duration: Approximately 8 months.
  •       Pay and benefits: Stipend of AED 29,665 per month, concessional staff travel tickets & medical insurance.

First Officer

Phase 5

EMIRATES GROUP HEADQUARTERS / DUBAI AIRPORT 

  •       As a line pilot you’ll be flying one of the youngest and most modern fleet of aircraft in the skies with the world’s largest international airline, Emirates. 
  •       Pay and benefits: AED 49,870 per month. (Basic pay and fixed allowances) concessional staff travel tickets & medical insurance.

Qualifications & Experience

Requirements

Here’s what we’re looking for in our candidates: 

  • Fall within the age range of 17 to 26.

jobList.Title: Take-Off Internship Programme (UAE Nationals Only)
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

The Take-Off Internship Programme provides an exciting kick-start to a career in the aviation industry for UAE National students at top international universities.

We are looking for enthusiastic UAE National students at the top 100 global universities to join our elite internship programme ‘Take-Off’. The programme will provide you a chance to obtain a unique real-world hands-on work experience, a network of experienced professionals in your field and an opportunity to be part of aviation-focused projects. The programme duration is based on your internship requirements and can extend up to 12 months.

 

Here's why you should apply:

·        The programme provide real world practical experience in exciting evolving industry

·        You will get a chance to connect and network with experienced professionals in the field of your studies

·        You will receive a personalized development plan catering to your career goals and learning objectives which includes on-job training, department rotations and projects

·        Multiple performance evaluations and feedback sessions to assess your learning progress

·        An opportunity to apply for a graduate programme post your internship with a fast-tracked training duration, if conditions met

 

What is the selection process?

As seats are limited, candidates will undergo a shortlisting and selection process, which includes an interview with the department representative.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to gain hands-on experience, expand your skills, and accelerate your career - apply now and embark on an unforgettable journey with Emirates Group’s Internship Programme

Qualifications & Experience

What is the eligibility criteria?

·        UAE Nationals with Khulasat Al Qaid

·        Current active university students at top 100 global universities (based on QS World University Rankings 2024)

·        Good academic standing of cumulative GPA of 3.00 and above (or equivalent)

·        Not currently bonded with another company

 

Note: if you are currently studying in a UAE-based university, kindly liaise with your university's Careers Office for your internship requests with the Emirates Group.

Salary & Benefits
Part of the programme benefits are the valuable experiences you'll gain, the industry connections you'll make and the opportunity to secure a graduate position with us. You will also receive additional benefits, that will be further explored as part of your on-boarding process."

jobList.Title: National High School Graduate Emirates SkyCargo Acceleration Programme
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

JOB PURPOSE

  • Emirates SkyCargo is seeking ambitious, customer-focused individuals to join our Cargo Agent Career Accelerator Program. This unique opportunity allows successful candidates to gain valuable industry experience, receive comprehensive training, and progress to the role of Cargo Supervisor within a span of three years.

    This program is designed to transform you from a Cargo Agent into a confident and competent Cargo Supervisor. During your first year, you will work as a Cargo Agent, gaining hands-on experience in the core operations of our cargo division.

    In the second year, you will transition into a more senior role, supervising certain operations and overseeing junior team members. In your final year, with our continued support and guidance, you'll step into the role of Cargo Supervisor, managing a team and making key operational decisions.

  • Key Responsibilities:

    • Coordinate and oversee the handling of cargo to ensure timely delivery and customer satisfaction.
    • Learn and adhere to safety regulations, procedures, and airline policies.
    • Communicate effectively with customers and respond to their queries.
    • Supervise and train junior team members as you progress through the program.

 

Qualifications & Experience

Qualifications:

High School certificate 70%

EMSAT (English score1400) or IELTS Band 6


Knowledge/Skills:

  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail.
  • Ability to multitask and perform under pressure.
  • Demonstrated leadership potential and teamwork.
  • Willingness to learn and grow in a dynamic work environment.


Leadership Role: No
Safety Sensitive Role: Yes

Salary & Benefits

jobList.Title: Service Technician DWC
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

To perform maintenance activities on powered and non-powered Ground Support, Material handling and Workshop Equipment in accordance to dnata standards and procedures.



Job Outline:

Generic Accountabilities:

  • Maintains good housekeeping in the workshop, other work areas, cleanliness of asset being worked on and take proper care of allocated tools.
  • Ensures standard safety procedures are followed during maintenance activities to prevent any personal injury or equipment/vehicle/plant damage, and that work is carried out in accordance with applicable SOPs and Work Instructions.
  • Ensures the calibration & certification of all tools & lifting equipment used are current and highlight any discrepancy or damage to such tools to relevant team member.
  • Proactively identifies opportunities to improve safety, efficiency, cost reduction, asset reliability and safety, by escalating ideas to the Master Level Technician for review.

 

Specific Accountabilities:

  • Carries out express servicing, minors and intermediates preventive maintenance as per checklist provided on equipment, vehicles, plant & machinery as allocated relevant allocation team.
  • Assists senior members of maintenance team and colleagues in major preventive maintenance on equipment, vehicles, plant & machinery as allocated relevant allocation team.
  • Carries out repairs & corrective maintenance on equipment, vehicles, plant & machinery, components and sub-assemblies under breakdown to minimise downtime.
  • Assists in the daily inspection of all equipment, vehicles, plant & machinery for operational reliability & safety.
  • Reports on condition of asset during execution of preventive maintenance activities to help plan and schedule any corrective maintenance requirement.
  • Ensures electrically operated equipment are provided with charged batteries.
  • Ensures all work-related activities carried out during the shift are recorded accurately and legibly in the work order to help planning staff log the details of work done in the Maintenance Management System.
  • Informs the relevant team member of the maintenance team on any spare parts & tools needed to ensure safe & timely completion of all maintenance tasks.
  • Supports the senior members of the maintenance team to provide operational support to ensure smooth material flow (cargo & baggage) within the automated material handling system.




Qualifications & Experience

Qualification:

Degree or Diploma from recognised institution in any of the below engineering disciplines:

Automotive - Electrical - Electronics - Mechanical - Hydraulics - Diesel engine.

 

Experience:

Degree Holders with 0 to 2 years of experience or Diploma holder with 2 to 4 years of experience in the field of maintenance in below industries:

  • GSE and Cargo Workshops in other airports
  • Baggage Handling in Airports
  • Automobile Workshop, (Cars, pickups, vans, small buses)
  • Heavy Equipment (earth moving, trucks, buses, construction, waste management, heavy material handling)
  • Process & Manufacturing Industries (refineries, aluminium processing, food processing, automated material handling, paper & plastic products are few examples) - Transportation industry (rail, metro etc)

 

Knowledge and Skills:

  • Certificate in other professionally recognised technical courses like Welding, Hydraulics, Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), Fabrication, Battery Handling etc.
  • Training from ground support & material handling equipment suppliers, established automotive and automotive component manufacturers.
  • UAE Driving Licence preferred in order to gain ADP
  • Proficient understanding of maintenance practices - English Language Skills Level 3
  • Level 2 for Welding/Fabrication Roles
  • Proficient Communication Skills
  • Proficient Safety Awareness Skills

jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose



The Aircraft Technician is responsible for carrying out maintenance tasks on Emirates and third party aircraft and components in accordance with laid down procedures and regulations. The Aircraft Technician will work as part of a team under the direction and guidance of the assigned Licensed Aircraft Engineer within the trade disciplines for which they have been trained.



Job Outline:


  • - Generic: - To carry out routine aircraft/engine/component servicing/ maintenance and/or approved structural repairs compliant to manufacturers procedures whilst observing all safety procedures for fluid replenishment, aircraft refuelling, aircraft systems charging/servicing as required.

  • - To complete any component replacement and other maintenance activities as directed by immediate supervisor. This will include the ability to obtain and understand Aircraft Maintenance Manual (AMM), Illustrated Parts catalogue (IPC), Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) or other approved documentation required to carry out this task.

  • - Assist Licensed Aircraft Engineers in `Walk around Checks on arrival and prior to departure as directed by the assigned engineer, in trouble shooting, defect rectifications and carrying out modifications while also performing instructions contained in job card.

  • - Participate and promote in creating a safety culture in an effort to minimize accidents and highlight deficiencies/failures that can lead to such accidents. Ensure all work locations are kept clean and excellent housekeeping conditions are maintained. This includes being aware and communicating safety shortfalls. To avoid FOD will be vigilant in ensuring work areas (including the ramp), vehicles, stands, lockers and that toolboxes are regularly audited, maintained and kept clean.

  • - Should be fully conversant with airport safety regulations including holding and maintaining an airport driving permit. Should be fully conversant with airport manoeuvring area requirements and be able to comply.

  • - Work closely with supervisor, through the PM review system to agree on development plans including training, strengths and weaknesses and time frames for completion. Grooming standards maintained and attendance to be maintained.

  • - Ensure prompt attendance to all allocated tasks with the intent to maximize the ground time and avoid operational delays/disruptions. This will include obtaining aircraft/ component status brief from LAEs/ reports and preparing accordingly. Should be able to communicate any aircraft/ component/ structural defects found to the LAE in an expedient manner and ensure during shift handovers all required information is clearly passed to the staff taking over before leaving the said aircraft/ workshop.



  • SPECIFIC JOB ACCOUNTABILITIES FOR EMIRATES FLIGHT TRAINING ACADEMY (EFTA)

- The role will be directly contributing to the safety and airworthiness through accomplishment of maintenance activity for the Academys fleet of 27 aircraft. The employee will be available to be deployed anywhere throughout the EFTA operation including diversionary airfields to assist in the recovery of an AOG.
- Maintain and repair academys aircrafts including the diagnosis of electrical and mechanical issues, the replacement of defective and worn parts, and the inspection of aircraft on a maintenance schedule in order to prevent problems before they happen. Conduct testing on a plane's communication and diagnostic systems and work specifically on electrical systems and different parts of EFTA aircraft.

:

jobList.Title: Outstation Graduate Training Programme (UAE Nationals Only)
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Join Our UAE Graduate Training Programme - Explore Global Opportunities!

Are you a recent graduate looking to start your career with one of the World’s most renowned brands? Do you have an unquenchable thirst for knowledge, a desire to explore new exciting opportunities overseas, and a passion to represent your Nation globally? If this sounds like you, then look no further!

We are thrilled to announce our UAE Graduate Training Programme, offering multiple Outstation opportunities outside of the UAE, with a market leading development programme ranging between 24 to 36 months.

About the National Graduate Training Programme

Our graduate training programmes offer Emirati graduates the opportunity to kick-start their careers with The Emirates Group. This unique position will give you the chance to represent different brands within The Emirates Group, such as Commercial, SkyCargo, dnata, and Airport Operations.

You will be The Group’s Ambassador in our different destinations across the globe. Our programmes are tailor-made to embrace and develop your talents and enhance your capabilities across different specialist areas.

Our promise to you: As part of this programme you’ll get unique hands-on experiences, access to leading training courses, relevant qualifications, and job rotations that will help you to develop the knowledge and skills required to establish a successful career with us.

Program Highlights:

•    24 to 36 Months of Comprehensive Training: This dynamic and unique programme offers you the opportunity to immerse yourself in the programme, rotating through the different outstation roles. Although there is no option to choose your location, this exciting overseas placement has the potential to extend up to 6 enriching years, where you will explore new cultures and experience a fulfilling and rewarding journey. During this time, you will gain invaluable hands-on experience and build a versatile skillset. Your placement locations will be confirmed as per business needs. Hence, we are seeking individuals who possess the flexibility and will thrive in changing environments.
•    International Placements: Experience work assignments in various countries, broadening your horizons and deepening your understanding of global markets.
•    Mentorship: Receive guidance from industry experts and senior leaders, ensuring you reach your full potential.
•    Continuous Learning: Access to cutting-edge training, workshops, and development programs throughout the duration of the program.
•    Global Network: Connect with a diverse cohort of fellow graduates, creating a lifelong network of international professionals.

Qualifications & Experience

Who We're Looking For:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree holders with a strong academic record 
  • GPA 2.8 or above
  • IELTS Score 6 and above or EMSAT English 1400 or TOEFL 550 (or willing to retake the assessment, if successful)
  • UAE Nationality (Passport & Khulasat Al Qaid)
  • Age between 21 – 27
  • Team Players: Collaborative individuals who thrive in multicultural environments.
  • Global Perspective: Those who are excited about working abroad and embracing new challenges.
  • Ambitious and Driven: Self-motivated individuals who are eager to excel and grow

Recruitment Process and Timeline:

  • Emirates Group is committed to cultivating UAE National talent with a robust Emiratisation strategy that offers numerous growth and development pathways.
  • Your application journey begins by applying via the Emirates Careers website. Please ensure to submit a complete application and attach all required documents. Our Recruitment Team will then review your profile, and if you meet the criteria for this programme, you’ll be invited to attend an in-person group assessment at Emirates HQ.
  • Following the group assessment, if shortlisted, you will then be invited to complete psychometric tests and to attend an in-person interview/assessment with our hiring managers. If you are successful at this stage, your recruiter will reach out to you with an offer, and then our Onboarding team will ensure a smooth transition to your new role at Emirates Group.

Note: Ministry of Higher Education attestation is required for certificates.

Salary & Benefits
Entry point package â€“ 20,829 AED + other benefits, e.g., travel concessions on Emirates and annual leave tickets; health insurance; comprehensive medical coverage; UAE national loan (after training); pension benefits (if applicable); Platinum discount."

jobList.Title: Web and App Data Analyst
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

About the role: 

The successful candidate will be responsible for ensuring the capture, analysis and dissemination of marketing and user experience data to ensure teams across Corporate Communication Marketing & Brand (CCMB) can make real-time, data-driven decisions. Work closely with Strategic Planners, Customer Insights and Customer Strategy & Retention to identify data capture requirements and, along with inputs from relevant teams across the department, design and implement analytics solutions.

What you will do:

  • Understand requirements for tracking, measurement and reporting across CCMB teams.
  • Support teams across CCMB through proper tagging and tracking, developing the guidelines and frameworks and ensuring the correct setup by agencies, third parties and internal teams. Define and implement marketing taxonomy to track data in an accurate manner.
  • Work closely with third parties, partners, suppliers, technology platforms and others to source data on performance of campaigns and programs. Ensure KPIs relevant to the CCMB teams can be tracked and measured, such that they can be used in-flight for optimization, post-campaign to gather learnings, or at the start of new campaigns/programs to develop strategies.
  • Work with teams across CCMB to understand and develop measurement KPIs and set up tracking and measurement. Document measurement frameworks, KPI development and reporting inputs for reference by all teams within CCMB as needed.
  • Build automated dashboards, reports and scorecards for self-service use across the CCMB department. Train and support teams across CCMB in understanding and utilizing the reports to make data-backed investment and marketing planning decisions.
  • Support campaign planning and in-flight optimisation by providing relevant data to Strategic Planners to support recommendations in response to briefs.
  • Develop predictive and forecasting models to support marketing planning and investment decisions across regions and channels.
  • Facilitate A/B Testing, multivariate tests and impact analysis on product releases through proper analytics setup, tracking and reporting in order to inform data-driven decisions and successive iterations as needed.
  • Monitor data quality, raising any quality issues with the appropriate teams within CCMB or externally to the vendors. Document and track these requests, updating impacted teams along the process.
  • Maintain compliance to Emirates Group privacy principles and work with the Data Privacy Network Liaison within CCMB to ensure privacy and security of personal data is considered by design and default in all aspects of the role.
Qualifications & Experience

This job might be for you if you have:

  • Degree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent) preferably in Engineering, Digital Marketing, E-Commerce or equivalent. Google Analytics Certification highly desired.
  • 5 years experience in digital marketing analytics in a global organization. Web, product or UX analytics.

You'll have an edge if you are:

  • Advanced knowledge of UX analytics platforms such as heat and scroll mapping tools, and web tracking and reporting tools.
  • Advanced knowledge of Google Analytics Tracking and reporting like conversion tracking, goals, segmentations, third party.
  • Intermediate query writing skills and knowledge of SQL, Google Big Query, Google cloud platform etc.
  • Intermediate understanding of different BI tools like Microstrategy and Tableau etc.
  • A basic understanding of performance driven Digital Marketing Channels like Paid Search, Affiliate Marketing, Email Marketing, Display Marketing etc.
  • Basic knowledge of advanced marketing analytics concepts like Multi-touch attribution, cross-device journeys, visitor cohorts etc.

 What Emirates can offer you?

  • A competitive salary, paid tax-free and reviewed annually
  • 39 calendar days annual leave, plus public holidays
  • Full relocation package, including flights, shipping and optional hotel accommodation on arrival 
  • Annual leave travel - return tickets home each year
  • Private medical insurance
  • Discounts on airline tickets for EK and partner networks
  • Travel benefits and discounts for friends & family
  • Education Support Allowance for children’s education in Dubai or abroad

Recruitment Process and Timeline

Emirates is an international organisation with employees from over 160 nationalities, we encourage applications from across the globe. Your application journey begins by applying via the Emirates Careers website. Please ensure your CV is up to date for our talent acquisition team to review your profile. If you meet the criteria of the role, you will then be invited to complete a HireVue video interview, to share more about your product experience and your career aspirations. If you are shortlisted you will then be invited to interview with our hiring managers. If you are successful, your recruiter will reach out to you with an offer and then our Onboarding team will ensure a smooth transition to your new role at Emirates.

Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."

jobList.Title: Engineer Flight Simulator - Emirates Flight Training Academy
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

To provide engineering support and carry out maintenance requirements on flight training devices (Flight Simulators) maintenance activity will include complex fault rectification and updated to the overall performance and fidelity of devices, whilst operating within time constraints in a shift environment on equipment with a high capital value.

Job Outline: 

  • Work within an established procedural framework to ensure the safety and reliability of each training device(flight simulators), including management of device software and simulation fidelity. Work will be carried out to the highest safety standards, and in accordance with Regulatory Authority requirements remain adaptable in order to ensure that the most critical tasks which have a direct impact on crew training and safety are being prioritised.
  • Ensure all routine scheduled maintenance tasks and defect rectification work is carried out in a timely manner to ensure that the operational requirements of each device are met.
  • Use specialist and experiential knowledge and application of engineering principles when assessing, troubleshooting, and planning the resolution of complex faults. Such work will involve liaison with internal and external agencies such as simulator manufacturers. Faults will require an analytical approach to problem solving involving judgement and evaluation which will vary depending on circumstances and symptoms.
  • Ensure deadlines for the completion of complex projects for improvements or upgrades being made to the training devices are met. Monitor the performance of external technical contractors involved in the accomplishment of a project.
  • Liaise directly with the Training and Operations teams regarding the availability of simulator and other training devices, and training schedules, to maintain a high standard of service to all device users. This will include communication of information relating to device training limitations or unavailability due to technical reasons including predicted timescales for rectification, to allow users to plan or modify their plans accordingly.
  • Identify improvements to the training devices, working practices and procedures, and training facilities when encountering areas requiring improvement, and where an operational or safety benefit may be obtained.
  • Ensure the accomplishment of specialist aspects of the maintenance of flight training devices including management and periodic assessment of the Master Qualification Test Guide (MQTG), the proper maintenance of system software updates, software back-up systems and ongoing assessment of the visual system for performance and deterioration.
  • Support Regulatory Authority (EASA, UAE GCAA, etc) activities during the initial and recurrent evaluation of the flight training devices.
  • Provide monthly report of the training devices status and reliability to the Simulator Manager and discuss any potential risks which could impact the training devices reliability. 
Qualifications & Experience
  • Degree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent)
  • Minimum of 5 years experience in flight simulation and training device maintenance.
  • Degree in Engineering (preferably aeronautical). Alternatively, academic requirements may be substituted for proven experience and expertise gained within the industry.
  • Minimum of 5 years experience in Flight Simulator Maintenance/Engineering, a track record of working in medium to large technical organisations and capable of producing results in multidisciplinary environments, technically aware, and have well-developed team development skills.

Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."

jobList.Title: Aircraft Maintenance Engineer License (AMEL) Scholarship Programme (UAE National)
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Aircraft Maintenance Engineer License (AMEL) Scholarship Programme


Join our elite AMEL Scholarship for UAE nationals at the Emirates Engineering Training College in Dubai. Become a skilled aircraft technician for the world's largest planes. Approved by UAE GCAA, our program offers top-notch training, expert guidance, and the chance to excel in maintaining our dynamic fleet. Elevate your career with us!
 
Programme Details
Our AMEL programme is fully sponsored and has an approximate duration of five years, consisting of two phases:
 
Phase 1
Initial Training - 3 years

You will go through intensive theoretical and practical training. Upon successful completion, you will receive a GCAA certificate from the Emirates Engineering Training College and a Higher Diploma from Emirates Aviation University, attested by KHDA.

What you will receive during this period? 

•    Monthly salary of AED 8,540
•    Concessional Tickets for you and your family
•    Medical coverage
•    Emirates Platinum discount

Phase 2
Practical Maintenance Experience (PME) - 2.5 years

In this phase, you will gain practical maintenance experience working on live aircraft. Upon completing this phase, you will qualify to apply to GCAA for the Basic Aircraft Maintenance Engineer Licence (AMEL) and you will become a full-fledged Aircraft Technician.

During this period, your monthly salary will progress to:

•    1st year AED 21,659
•    2nd year AED 22,659
•    Upon successful completion, AED 23,697 

Qualifications & Experience

Requirements

Here’s what we’re looking for in our candidates: 

•    Fall within the age range of 18 to 24.
•    Have successfully completed Grade 12 with a minimum score of 80%. 
•    Have completed the National Service before joining the program *You can start the selection process after completing high school.
•    Be medically fit.
•    Hold a valid UAE passport and Khulasat Al Qaid.
•    English Fluency *You are expected to provide (post-assessment) TOEFL PBT score of 510/IBT 6.5, or an IELTS score of 6, or EMSAT 1400.


Our Selection Process

If you meet the requirements, you will undergo the following selection process:
1.    Math and Physics Tests
2.    Panel Interview
3.    Medical examination

jobList.Title: Resource Allocator (EKAS) - (UAE National)
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

dnata is one of the world's largest air services providers offering ground handling, cargo, travel, and flight catering services across five continents. We operate in 38 countries and 136 airports globally.

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Ground Support Equipment (GSE) Electrical Technician to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for the installation, maintenance, troubleshooting, and repair of electrical systems in ground support equipment (GSE) used in aviation and transportation industries. Your expertise will ensure the safe and reliable operation of electrical equipment, contributing to the overall efficiency and effectiveness of our operations. 


In this role, you will:

- Install, inspect, maintain, and repair electrical systems and components in GSE equipment, including but not limited to aircraft tugs, baggage tractors, and ground power units. 

- Conduct regular inspections and preventive maintenance on electrical systems to identify and resolve potential issues before they become critical. 

- Diagnose electrical malfunctions, using appropriate testing equipment and techniques, and implement effective repair solutions. 

- Collaborate with other technicians and team members to troubleshoot complex electrical problems and develop innovative solutions. 

- Keep accurate records of maintenance and repair activities, including equipment conditions, maintenance schedules, and parts used. 

- Adhere to safety guidelines and regulations while working with electrical systems, ensuring a safe working environment for yourself and others. 

- Stay updated with industry trends, new technologies, and best practices related to GSE electrical systems to enhance skills and knowledge. 

Qualifications & Experience

To be considered for the role, you must meet the below requirements:

- High school diploma or equivalent; technical certification or associate degree in electrical engineering or a related field is preferred. 

- Proven experience as an electrical technician, preferably in the aviation or transportation industry. 

- Strong knowledge of electrical systems, components, and wiring diagrams. 

- Familiarity with GSE equipment and its electrical systems is highly desirable. 

- Proficiency in using electrical testing equipment, hand tools, and power tools. 

- Ability to read and interpret technical manuals, diagrams, and schematics. 

- Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. 

- Strong attention to detail and adherence to safety protocols. 

- Effective communication and collaboration skills. 

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. 

Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. jobList.Title: Senior Technical Engineer - Observability and Ops Intelligence
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

At Emirates, we believe in connecting the world, to and through, our global hub in Dubai; and in constantly innovating to ensure our customers ‘Fly Better’. 

Emirates Group IT thrives on the dynamic nature of technology. Being pioneers in aviation innovation, we're always at the forefront, pushing boundaries. We're on the lookout for exceptional IT professionals to fortify our position as leaders in the industry. Embark on a journey with the world’s largest international airline and become a vital part of our cutting-edge information and technology team as a Senior Technical Engineer - Observability and Ops Intelligence

As a Senior Technical Engineer, in the Observability team, you will lead the implementation and administration of state-of-the-art monitoring tools for infrastructure, applications, and platforms. Taking a proactive approach, our team ensures swift issue remediation and rapid incident response through advanced monitoring solutions. If you are passionate about improving system reliability and minimizing downtime, we invite you to apply and contribute to the success of the Emirates Group.

In this role you will:

  • Provide expert technical consultancy and guidance to EG-IT dealing within the technology area and act as lead technical member in the Project team delivering the work packages assigned.
  • Develop IT Solutions that meet customer requirements. Ensure that the design is robust, appropriate and of high quality and conforming to corporate standards and in line with the technical strategy.
  • Ensure that the developed architecture/solution meets the service level requirements in terms of expected availability, capacity, continuity, security, performance and reliability. Ensuring that the developed architecture/solution meets the service level requirements in terms of expected availability, capacity, continuity, security, performance and reliability.
  • Foster the development of high performing technical teams to meet strategic architectural objectives. Develop Solution architectures for assigned projects with established EA standards and also to support in the development of technology advancements and adaptation of new technologies.
  • Collaborate with other IT Technology Teams to implement ongoing monitoring of the relevant technology to ensure severity 1 & 2 Incidents are configured within EMS.
  • Provide guidance to Project managers / Technology Team Managers for solution definition, technical design and development of in house developed solutions. These are to be delivered as per agreed costs and timescales to meet signed off functional, technical and process requirements.
  • Ensure that assigned incidents are resolved within the agreed Service Levels and problems are defined and analysed in line with the Problem Management Process. Ensure that solutions to problems meet the architectural and security standards within the technology area and impact to the business is minimised.
  • Publish and maintain high quality documentation for technology area. Working within the standard templates and documentation guidelines which includes detailed design, configuration details, support procedures, operations manuals and deployment architecture.
  • Manage End of Life replacement of equipment and/or software within the technology area to ensure conformance to technical standards and support the Technology initiatives and directions.
  • Ensure the process and Enhancement specifications are translated into effective programs with error free code using the enterprise development tools, methods and languages.
Qualifications & Experience

To be considered for the role, you must meet the below requirements:

  • Degree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent) in Information Technology or relevant and 5+ Years of experience
  • Proficiency in utilizing advanced data science techniques to comprehend observability data thoroughly. Ability to apply predictive modelling and insightful analysis to vast amounts of data generated by monitoring systems.
  • Skill in contributing to proactive management of system performance and reliability through above mentioned techniques.
  • Carry out statistical analysis, machine learning, and data mining techniques to analyse observability data and extract meaningful patterns.
  • Build predictive models to identify potential issues, anomalies, and trends in system behaviour.
  •  Identify and engineer relevant features from observability data that contribute to the development of effective predictive models.
  • Work with domain experts to understand key performance indicators and relevant metrics for analysis. Deep understanding of Metrics, Logs and Traces and their influence over application health and performance.
  • Exceptional knowledge in Observability solutions like AppDynamics, Splunk, ELK, Grafana and in analytics. Hands experience with analytics   tools with Python, Pandas, R, SQL.
  • Ability to tell story with business and application performance data using query tools like Splunk SPLs, SQL etc. and data visualisation frameworks by creating insightful dashboards. Hands on work experience on Distributed tracing products and OpenTelemetry framework.
  • Deep understanding of container management solutions – Kubernetes / Docker / Openshift / EKS / AKS.  Essential Public cloud services: AWS Lambda, Cloudwatch, Kinesis, Azure Monitor.
Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."

jobList.Title: Senior Technical Engineer - Public Cloud - Emiratization Position
jobList.JobDescription:
"
Job Purpose

Emirates IT is looking for the right candidate to join our unique public cloud journey and be a part of the dynamic high performing team of experts who are actively working on maturing our cloud footprint, unlocking native capabilities and automating our services. With long standing partnerships with leading hyperscaler’s and key workloads hosted globally, we are looking to expand our existing team with innovative cloud experts that will help us elevate our cloud posture and drive end to end automation. 

The Senior Technical Engineer – Public Cloud (UAE National) will take an active role in developing and maturing the product and services roadmap on the public cloud, in alignment with architecture principles and IT strategy. She/he will design, develop, support, and deliver automated and cost-effective public cloud services. This includes working on landing zone components, shared services, network, policies and consumable services, using Infrastructure as Code through Terraform. The successful candidate will also take part in application onboarding and cost optimisation on the cloud recommending and implementing saving plans wherever applicable. 

In this role, you will: 

  • Take an active role in developing the public cloud roadmap. Provide recommendations and feedback for enhancements and implement cloud native capabilities to replace traditional services.
  • Follow Emirates Agile Delivery methodology to design and deliver features aligned with the roadmap. Establish and maintain product documentations and low-level design documents on confluence.
  • Implement and maintain landing zones, availability zones and shared services through code.
  • Drive Infrastructure as code automation in all public cloud offerings and services through Terraform.
  • Enforce standards, security compliance and guardrails using policies through code.
  • Assist in establishing cost optimization practices on the cloud.
  • Have a solid understanding of cloud networking and have the ability to assist in network management.
  • Participate in application onboarding to the public cloud.
  • Provide required operational support to cloud services in line with the agreed services levels.
  • Foster the development of high performing technical teams to meet strategic architectural objectives.
Qualifications & Experience

To be considered for the role, you must meet the below requirements:

  • Experience working with Public Cloud providers AWS/Azure: 5+ Years
  • Overall  8+ Years of experience within Information Technology. 
  • Degree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent): Degree in Information Technology
  • Certifications: AWS/Azure Certified Solutions Architect 
  • 5+ Years of Hands-on experience in AWS Cloud engineering and delivery.
  • 5+ Years of Hands-on experience in MS Azure Cloud engineering and delivery.
  • Excellent knowledge in scripting and automation platforms (such as: Terraform and Jenkins)
  • Knowledge/skills: ITIL and AGILE Frameworks

Advantageous skills:

  • AKAMAI knowledge on CDN and GTM Capabilities
  • Kubernetes experience
Salary & Benefits
Join us in Dubai and enjoy an attractive tax-free salary and travel benefits that are exclusive to our industry, including discounts on flights and hotels stays around the world. You can find out more information about our employee benefits in the Working Here section of our website www.emirates.com/careers. Further information on whatâ€™s it like to live and work in our cosmopolitan home city, can be found in the Dubai Lifestyle section."
